summary: Email from PayPal Law Enforcement Fulfillment Team analyst Ashley Betzhold to an unspecified recipient, confirming fulfillment of a records request related to Jeffrey Epstein (case reference 791064) and offering to serve as point of contact for future subpoenas or questions.

persons.name: Ashley Betzhold
persons.role: Analyst, Global Law Enforcement Fulfillment Team at PayPal
persons.context: Author of the email; works in PayPal's Global Investigations, Global Financial Crime and Customer Protection division; fulfilled a records request related to Jeffrey Epstein and offers to be the point of contact for the investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the PayPal records request (case reference 791064).

connections.description: Betzhold, as a PayPal law enforcement analyst, fulfilled a records request related to the investigation of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: PayPal records request fulfilled
events.description: Ashley Betzhold of PayPal's Law Enforcement Fulfillment Team confirms she has received and fulfilled a subpoena/records request related to Jeffrey Epstein (case reference 791064).

keyFacts: PayPal received and fulfilled a law enforcement records request (case reference 791064) related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The request was handled by Ashley Betzhold, an analyst on PayPal's Global Law Enforcement Fulfillment Team.
The email, dated August 30, 2019, indicates an active financial investigation into Epstein was ongoing at that time.
PayPal has a dedicated Safety Hub and process for law enforcement to submit subpoenas and requests.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and intended only for the authorized recipient.
